hero.title: Excursion Studio - Courses
hero.description: This series of tutorials is designed for robotics students. Currently covering the field of Probabilistic Robotics, including Convex Optimization, Differential Geometry, and Stochastic Processes. Additionally, there are ROS2 basic and advanced tutorials available for practice. More courses in related fields will be added in the future.
